webwork-tex.statement:
For the curve given by \(r(t) = \langle 8 t, -7 t,1 + 7 t^2 \rangle\),
\par Find the derivative \leavevmode\\\relax \(r'(t) = \langle\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}} \(\rangle\) \par Find the second derivative \leavevmode\\\relax \(r''(t) = \langle\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}} \(\rangle\) \par Find the curvature at \(t = 1\) \leavevmode\\\relax \(\kappa (1) =\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}}
